a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Malaria deaths: IHME vs. WHO estimates, 2021
Annual number of deaths from malaria sourced from the IHME's Global Burden of Disease versus estimates
from the World Health Organization. Shown is a line of parity; if estimates between IHME and WHO data
matched, points would lie along this line.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024); World Health Organization - Global Health Observatory (2024)
